meanings.definition: The quality of being well-proportioned and attractive in shape.
meanings.sent1: Her dance performance captivated the audience with its shapelinesses.
meanings.sent2: The artist admired the shapelinesses of the sculpture he had created.
meanings.sent3: The cake's shapelinesses were so perfect that it seemed almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a display of shapelinesses, each flower adding to the overall beauty.
meanings.sent5: The fashion designer's collection showcased the shapelinesses of the models in a stunning way.

meanings.definition: The state of having an attractive form or figure.
meanings.sent1: The actress's shapelinesses made her stand out on the red carpet.
meanings.sent2: Fitness enthusiasts strive to maintain their shapelinesses through regular exercise.
meanings.sent3: The mannequin's shapelinesses made it the center of attention in the store window.
meanings.sent4: The mountain range's shapelinesses against the sunset created a breathtaking view.
meanings.sent5: The ballerina's graceful movements highlighted her shapelinesses on stage.
